term.title: ferredoxin

item.text: A protein containing more than one iron and acid-labile sulfur, that displays electron-transfer activity but not classical enzyme function.

sources.item: PAC, 1997, 69, 1251. 'Glossary of terms used in bioinorganic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1997)' on page 1275 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199769061251)

term.citation: Citation: 'ferredoxin' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.FT06771

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
